12.title: Shrunken Pest

123.content:
Shawki looked up at the now enormous captain syrup. Her feet were the size of city busses, and although he tried, his current position (which was right in-front of her feet; he could not see her face because of the generous swell on her chest. Shawki backed up and saw the evil grin on Syrups face.
“I don’t know what you’re up to, but it can’t be anything good. I’m out of here!” Shawki made a run for it, but was quickly lifted into the air, and found himself staring into the giant face of Captain Syrup.
“Well we’re not so big and bad now are we Shawki?” said Syrup. Her voice was loud, and Shawki covered his ears to keep them from being ruptured. Syrups warm breath washed over him as she spoke, and he was surprised to smell that it wasn’t that bad smelling. Syrup giggled at the look upon her small victims face.
“What’s wrong Shawki? Don’t have anything smart to say to me now that you’re no bigger than a French fry?”
“You won’t get away with this, you @(!” said Shawki.
“Now now, little Shawki, no potty language. I think I have a perfect punishment for an insolent brat like you. I’ll say this much, it’s been a while since I had a decent meal.”
“What are you getting at?” said Shawki, with obvious fear in his voice. Syrup giggled, as she brought Shawki closer to her face. He held her in-front of her large, pouty lips. Then she stuck out her tongue, and licked Shawki, who was aroused, but also surprised, at the current predicament. Shawki felt as if a large wet sponge had just been wiped across his body. Syrup licked him slowly, also softly moaning as she did. When she finished, she looked down and giggled at Shawki’s bewildered and saliva covered face.
“What’s the matter Shawki? Don’t tell me you didn’t enjoy that. Shawki said nothing.
“Mmmm, you tasted pretty darn good. I think it’s time we go to the next step.” With almost no hesitation. Syrup opened her mouth wide, showing off her wet, pink tongue, white teeth, and pink uvula. Syrup threw her head back and held Shawki above her face. Slowly, but surely, she began lowering Shawki towards her awaiting mouth. Once he was passed her lips, she let go, and Shawki hit the back part of her mouth. Immediately, she closed her mouth, and Shawki could no longer see. Syrup then began to roll Shawki around in her mouth, making sure to taste every last inch of the tiny, struggling morsel in her mouth. As the played with him, she could feel him struggling and hear his futile shouts.
“LET ME OUT!” shouted Shawki, as he was being thrown from one side of the mouth to the other, as if he were some kind of piece of candy. Shawki felt the wet saliva began to coat his body, and his shirt began to stick to his body. He had no idea how he was going to get out of this one.

What will happen next?

"It is so beautiful that you can not die my darling", she sayed into his blood red eyes. "I have so many great plans for you... like snaping your neck, crushing your skull or ripping your heart out. Oh, and this", with her free hand she grabbed his lower arm and twisted it around his ellbow, shattering the bones at the joint. "Hmmm a beatiful sound, but I cant hear you scream..." With a sudden movement his nack snapped and his head hung lose to the sides. The fight was over within 12 seconds. and only because she wanted to enjoy it. "You seem to need a break - human", before she tossed him aside a dozen meters and watched him regenerate before she approached him for round two.

info.brief_description: Long ago a boy defeated Captain syrup and made a fool out of her, its time for her revenge
info.description:
Alright Listen up and listen up good, Long ago in someone else's story there was a boy Named Shawki who defeated Captain syrup once and made a fool out of her, right now she is trapped in a dimension of nothingness but now she found a plan to bring Shawki back to the dimension leaving only him and her and the point of this story is to give Captain Syrup the chance of her life to get back at him, now here's a description:

Shawki: He's a 16 year old teen, he is invincible meaning that he cant die BUT he can feel everything thats being done to him. He also has super strenght but in the dimension all his powers are removed except for his invincibility making Captain syrups job allot easier!
Here a pic if you need refrence to the guy:

http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs41/f/2009/005/a/6/Shawki_Gaia_style_by_tnyshawk.png...

Alright here's whats allowed:
-Captain syrup can torture shawki with any thing-
-Beating the crap out of him
-Steping all over his body
-Sitting on him (Face farting is allowed)
-No tickling, i mean seriously she's trying to hurt him not make him laugh
-You can make wither Her Grow into a Giantess or have Shawki Shrink But I dont think it will matter.
-If anyone Shrink/Grow happens Syrup can do anything/Put him anywhere
-Poop is allowed if you want
-Also Syrup can use a Powder to paralyze Shawki incase he tries to get away
-Syrup can have a ray that can change the size and wieght of someone so she can make herself fatter in order to squish Shawki and not let him get away

Thats all and Have fun!
